name: getHotAddBandwidth
description: Get the ingest and export bandwidth limits in Mbps when using HotAdd with the vCenter. These limits are shared across all HotAdd proxies for the Center.

id.description: The ID of the vCenter server from which to derive the number of proxies needed.

$ul: **exportLimit**: The HotAdd bandwidth limit in Mbps for export.
**ingestLimit**: The HotAdd bandwidth limit in Mbps for ingest.
